summary:
MetaBoards redefines tabletop strategy with a revolutionary, unique board game - MetaBoards showcases technological innovation, tailor made to provide gamers with unmatched performance and experience. Five immersive boards await, each one VR enabled for maximum immersion.

 Roll with confidence - Dice rolls are completely randomized by Chainlink’s VRF. That's how we roll. - Dice rolls are completely randomized by Chainlink’s VRF.

 True ownership of in-game assets - You own your NFTs. Lock them for rent payments when players land on your space.

 Intricate but not complex - Metaboards is comprised of over 20 custom and meticulously designed contracts for optimal game-play experience.

 Custom built from head to toe, Metaboards showcases technological innovation, tailor made to provide gamers with unmatched performance and experience. Five immersive boards await, each one VR enabled for maximum immersion. - Metaboards showcases technological innovation, tailor made to provide gamers with unmatched performance and experience. Five immersive boards await, each one VR enabled for maximum immersion.

 Lose yourself in unique gameplay mechanics and our massive NFT art collections to suit every aesthetic. - Lose yourself in unique gameplay mechanics and our massive NFT art collections to suit every aesthetic.

 The Vault combines the best elements of a rewards token with the best elements of a miner. Earn Vault Points by playing the game, and redeem them for rewards. - The Vault combines the best elements of a rewards token with the best elements of a miner. Earn Vault Points by playing the game, and redeem them for rewards.

 Coming soon to Arbitrum, Metaboards is 2+ years in the making - and it shows. - Coming soon to Arbitrum, Metaboards is 2+ years in the making - and it shows.
